data.title: Brian O'Halloran: The Clerks III Interview at Edmonton Expo 2022 — GNN
data.meta_description: I spoke with actor Brian O'Halloran at the 2022 Edmonton Expo. He plays Dante in Clerks III, a pinnacle character in the Clerks movie franchise by Kevin Smith.
data.text:
I’m ridiculously excited and happy to share my interview with Brian O’Halloran from the 2022 Edmonton Expo. I assure you, he WAS supposed to be there that day. Soooo…What did we talk about? Hmmm…I wonder, perhaps CLERKS III. Yeah, that’s right.

The most important note:

CLERKS III is being released in Canadian theatres Wednesday, September 21 (That’s TODAY!). Find it and go see it once , or I don’t know…37 times. 37!!!!

Anyhow, go ahead and hit play on the interview below and enjoy. Oh, one more thing. Brian: Thanks for being super awesome and chatting with me. Please note: This interview is not sponsored by CHEWLIES GUM.

Okay, a few more quick notes:

You can find Brian the following ways:
